Virtual Private Cloud¶

This tab will be used to handle VPC isntances that you can save for their late use in depoyment of resources.

VPS --> Add VPS

AWS¶

  • Inputs
    • VPS Name: Resource Name
    • VPS Type: ec2 instance type
    • Access Key:
    • Secret Key:
    • Region: region
    • AMI: ami
    • SSH Keyname: EC2 keyname
    • SSH Key: EC2 pem key string
